contentrichtext.text: :''For the Debian configuration management system, see "[[debconf (software package)]]".'' '''DebConf''' is the yearly conference where [[Debian]] developers meet to discuss issues around the further development of the system. Besides the scheduled workshops and talks, Debian developers take the opportunity to [[Hack (technology slang)|hack]] on the Debian system in a more informal setting. This has been institutionalised by introducing the '''DebCamp''' in the Oslo DebConf in 2003: a room is set aside and computing infrastructure provided. [[File:Debconfshirts12.jpg|thumb|center|550px|DebConf t-shirts from conferences 3-12.]] ==Locations== Locations of past and future DebConf events: {| class="wikitable" |[http://debconf0.debconf.org/ DebConf0]||2000||July 5–9||[[Bordeaux]], [[France]] |- |[http://debconf1.debconf.org/ DebConf1]||2001||July 2–5||Bordeaux, France |- |[http://debconf2.debconf.org/ DebConf2]||2002||July 5–7||[[Toronto]], [[Canada]] |- |[http://debconf3.debconf.org/ DebConf3]||2003||July 18–20||[[Oslo]], [[Norway]] |- |[http://debconf4.debconf.org/ DebConf4]||2004||May 26–June 2||[[Porto Alegre]], [[Brazil]] |- |[http://debconf5.debconf.org/ DebConf5]||2005||July 10–17 ||[[Helsinki]], [[Finland]] |- |[http://debconf6.debconf.org/ DebConf6]||2006||May 14–22||[[Oaxtepec]], [[Mexico]] |- |[http://debconf7.debconf.org/ DebConf7]||2007|| June 17–23 || [[Edinburgh]], [[Scotland]] |- |[http://debconf8.debconf.org/ DebConf8]||2008|| August 10–16 || [[Mar del Plata]], [[Argentina]] |- |[http://debconf9.debconf.org/ DebConf9]||2009|| July 24–30 || [[Cáceres, Spain|Cáceres]], [[Spain]] |- |[http://debconf10.debconf.org/ DebConf10]||2010|| August 1–7 || [[New York City|New York]], [[United States|USA]] |- |[http://debconf11.debconf.org/ DebConf11]||2011|| July 24–30 || [[Banja Luka]], [[Bosnia and Herzegovina]] |- |[http://debconf12.debconf.org/ DebConf12]||2012|| July 8–14 || [[Managua]], [[Nicaragua]] |- |[http://debconf13.debconf.org/ DebConf13]||2013|| August 11–18 || [[Vaumarcus]], [[Switzerland]] |- |DebConf14||2014|| August || [[Portland, Oregon]], [[United States|USA]] |- |} == Miniconf == This is a smaller Debian event, held annually at the Australian Linux Conference, [[linux.conf.au]]. Locations of past and future Miniconf events: {| class="wikitable" |[http://www.linux.org.au/conf/2002/debiancon.html Debian GNU/Linux: Australian Mini-Conference 2002]||2002||Feb 4–5||[[Brisbane]], [[Australia]] |- |[http://web.archive.org/web/20050623152740/http://www.debconf.org/lca2003/ Debian Miniconf2]||2003||Jan 20–21||[[Perth, Western Australia|Perth]], [[Australia]] |- |[http://web.archive.org/web/20050624071721/http://debconf.org/miniconf3/ Debian Miniconf3]||2004||Jan 12–13||[[Adelaide]], [[Australia]] |- |[http://web.archive.org/web/20050624071651/http://debconf.org/miniconf4/ Debian Miniconf4]||2005||Apr 18–19||[[Canberra]], [[Australia]] |- |[http://miniconf5.debconf.org/ Debian Miniconf5]||2006||Jan 23–24 ||[[Dunedin]], [[New Zealand]] |- |[http://miniconf6.debconf.org/ Debian Miniconf6]||2007||Jan 15–16||[[Sydney]], [[Australia]] |- |[http://www.debian.org/News/weekly/2010/01/#6 MiniDebConf Centroamérica: Panamá]||2010||Mar 20–23||[[Panama City]], [[Panamá]] |- |[http://www.minidebconf.de/2010/berlin/ MiniDebConf 2010]||2010||Jun 10–11||[[Berlin]], [[Germany]] |- |[http://wiki.debian.org/DebianIndia/MiniDebConf2010 MiniDebConf 2010 India]||2010||Aug 7–8||[[Pune]], [[India]] |- |[http://wiki.debian.org/DebianIndia/MiniDebConf2013/Calicut MiniDebConf 2013 India]||2013||Feb 22–24||[[Kozhikode]], [[India]] |- |} {{Portal|Free software}} ==External links== * [http://www.debconf.org DebConf website] * [http://meetings-archive.debian.net/pub/debian-meetings/ DebConf video archive] {{Debian}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Debconf}} [[Category:Linux conferences]] [[Category:Debian]] [[Category:Free-software conferences]] [[Category:Recurring events established in 2000]] {{compu-conference-stub}}
